```{r setup1, eval=TRUE}
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("zoo")


library(zoo)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
```


```{r read-data,eval=TRUE}

flights <- read.csv("Data/flights.csv",header=TRUE,sep=",",na.strings = c("","NA")) 

test <- flights[rowSums(is.na(flights))<4,] %>% mutate(flight.name=na.locf(X)) %>% select(-X) %>% gather("location","timings",2:6) %>% spread("X.1","timings")


test1 <- spread(test,"X.1","timings")
  

gather(test,"flight.name","timings",2:6)

test1 <-  test %>% group_by(X) %>% ungroup(X) 

filter(flights, flights$Phoenix > 20 )

```
